QuestData.Title: Together Again
QuestData.Description: We saw to it that the brave was healed and re-equipped. I already sent him back into the field.$B$BHead back up and go to Darkcloud Pinnacle. He'll meet you there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Freewind Brave at Darkcloud Pinnacle in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: I am honored by your presence, $n. Let us put the fear of the Earth Mother into the Grimtotem.
